positive_examples: This is an example of industrial robot.
The industrial robot demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed industrial robot in this context.
A typical case of industrial robot would involve these features.
The concept of industrial robot applies here.
A robot designed for manufacturing and industrial automation tasks such as welding, painting, or assembly.
negative_examples: This is an example of autonomous mobile robot, not industrial robot.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AutonomousMobileRobot, or other types of Robot

definition: A programmable robot used in manufacturing for automated production tasks.
